类 Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Job>
    直接已知子类:
    CompoundJob

    public class Job
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Job>
    components of a job file
    作者:
    Bruce Dong

      Stores basic information of a job (job id automatically add one)

      Stores basic information of a job

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Job

        public Job(int earliestStart,
           int deadline,
           int duration,
           int profit)
        Stores basic information of a job (job id automatically add one)
        参数:
        earliestStart - the earliest start time of the job
        deadline - deadline of the job
        duration - length of time to finish the job
        profit - payment of the job

      • Job

        public Job(int id,
           int earliestStart,
           int deadline,
           int duration,
           int profit)
        Stores basic information of a job
        参数:
        id - the order number of the job
        earliestStart - the earliest start time of the job
        deadline - deadline of the job
        duration - length of time to finish the job
        profit - payment of the job
